lead_paragraph: Oh yeah, Kevin Durant fully planned on putting up the initial shot for the U.S. as he played his first game at Oracle Arena since joining the Golden State Warriors.

headline.print_headline: Kevin Durant Shines in First Game at New Home Arena
headline.main: Kevin Durant Shines in First Game at New Home Arena
